title.narrative: National and local plans and budgets are gender responsive

description.narrative: Strengthened capacity of governments to assess fiscal laws and policies and advocate for policy solutions in support of gender responsive revenue and budgetary allocations.

title.narrative: Capacity of advocates for gender and women’s rights networks and institutions to demand accountability for GEWE commitments in line with Global norms and standards is strengthened.

comment.narrative: Yes 3: The Gender Task Force (JLOS); the Gender Statistics Committee (UBoS); the GRB Unit and the Technical Working Committee in the MoFPED were established and GEE compacts and compedium developed.
